name: New World Logistics Group, Inc.
description: New World Logistics Group, Inc. is a leading provider of supply chain management and logistics solutions, specializing in innovative transportation and distribution services. Founded in 2010, the company aims to optimize the supply chain processes of businesses across various industries, including retail, e-commerce, and manufacturing. With a focus on technology-driven solutions, New World Logistics leverages advanced analytics and artificial intelligence to enhance operational efficiency and reduce costs for its clients. The company offers a comprehensive range of services, including freight forwarding, warehousing, inventory management, and last-mile delivery. New World Logistics is committed to sustainability and works closely with partners to implement eco-friendly practices throughout its operations. The firm’s mission is to empower businesses with the tools they need to succeed in an increasingly competitive marketplace while maintaining a strong emphasis on customer service and satisfaction. As the logistics landscape evolves, New World Logistics continues to adapt and innovate, ensuring its clients are equipped to meet the challenges of the modern economy.

seo.meta_title: New World Logistics Group, Inc. | Innovative Supply Chain Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore New World Logistics Group, Inc. for cutting-edge logistics and supply chain management solutions. Discover services that enhance operational efficiency and reduce costs.

faq.question: What services does New World Logistics offer?
faq.answer: New World Logistics offers a range of services including freight forwarding, warehousing, inventory management, and last-mile delivery.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of New World Logistics?
faq.answer: Jessica Lee is the CEO of New World Logistics Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is New World Logistics headquartered?
faq.answer: New World Logistics is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.

faq.question: When was New World Logistics founded?
faq.answer: New World Logistics was founded in 2010.
